plugin.name: ðŸ“™ Note Helpers
plugin.description: Commands to quickly jump around and manage notes
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark & Eduard Metzger
plugin.lastUpdateInfo:
0.20.1: new command 'printNote' for debugging purposes.
0.20.0: new commands "unlinked note finder" and "delete note". Bug fix to "rename note filename" command.
0.19.2: fix edge cases with "add trigger to note".
0.19.1: "add trigger to note" command can now be run from template. Added migration message about 'open note' commands.
0.19.0: fix to '/rename inconsistent filename' command. Moved 'open note' functions to WindowTools plugin. Updated the display of the 'index folders' command. Removed 'Show month/quarter/year' commands as they are now in the main NP menus.
0.18.2: fix edge case with /add trigger command.
0.18.1: Add 3 file naming commands (by @leo)
.0.18.0: Add '/Show This Month/Quarter/Year'  and '/update all indexes' commands
0.17.3: fix bugs in '/index folders'. New setting 'Title to use for Index notes'. 0.17.0: new command '/open url from a note'.

plugin.commands.name: add number of days to dates
plugin.commands.description: Look for bullets mentioning dates and add number of days till that date

plugin.commands.name: add trigger to note
plugin.commands.description: Select from a list of available triggers to add to the current note

plugin.commands.name: convert to frontmatter
plugin.commands.description: Convert the current note to use frontmatter syntax, including some default text that can be added in the Plugin's settings

plugin.commands.name: delete note
plugin.commands.description: Delete the current note (moves to Trash)

plugin.commands.name: enable heading links
plugin.commands.description: Look for Links to headings and make them work by converting them to plugin command calls

plugin.commands.name: find and link unlinked notes in current note
plugin.commands.description: Find and create links to unlinked notes

plugin.commands.name: find and link unlinked notes in all notes
plugin.commands.description: Find and create links to all unlinked notes

plugin.commands.name: jump to heading
plugin.commands.description: Jumps to the heading that the user selects. (Currently only works in main window)

plugin.commands.name: jump to note's heading
plugin.commands.description: Jump to a different note, and then selected heading. (Currently only works in main window)

plugin.commands.name: jump to done
plugin.commands.description: Jump to the '## Done' section. (Currently only works in main window)

plugin.commands.name: move note
plugin.commands.description: Moves the currently opened (non-calendar) note to a folder you select

plugin.commands.name: index folders
plugin.commands.description: Make/Update indexes for all notes in a folder (and sub-folders if wanted)

plugin.commands.name: open URL from a note
plugin.commands.description: Open a chosen URL from a chosen note

plugin.commands.name: reset caches
plugin.commands.description: Reset NotePlan caches

plugin.commands.name: list inconsistent note filenames
plugin.commands.description: Lists the names of notes whose filenames are inconsistent with their titles.

plugin.commands.name: rename filename to title
plugin.commands.description: Renames the current filename to the title of the note.

plugin.commands.name: rename note filename
plugin.commands.description: Rename the current note's filename to one you specify.

plugin.commands.name: reset title to match filename
plugin.commands.description: Resets the current note title to match its filename.

plugin.commands.name: rename inconsistent note filenames
plugin.commands.description: Renames the files of notes whose filenames are inconsistent with their titles.

plugin.commands.name: update all indexes
plugin.commands.description: Update all folder index notes

plugin.commands.name: NoteHelpers: update plugin settings
plugin.commands.description: Settings interface (even for iOS)

plugin.commands.name: log note details
plugin.commands.description: Log main details about note to console

plugin.commands.name: triggerFindUnlinkedNotes
plugin.commands.description: onEditorWillSave

commandMigrationMessage: Note: the 'open ... note in new ...' commands have been migrated to the WindowTools plugin.

plugin.settings.title: Default Text to add to frontmatter
plugin.settings.description: The standard text to add after the title in the frontmatter. Can include line breaks by typing return.

plugin.settings.title: Sort order for index items
plugin.settings.description: Whether index entries are sorted alphabetically by title (the default), by created date, or by last updated date

plugin.settings.title: What type of date suffix to add?
plugin.settings.description: What type of date/time period to add to the end of note links in the index. 'timeSince' is time since the note was last updated; 'updatedDate' shows the date the note was last updated.

plugin.settings.title: Include Subfolders when making an index?
plugin.settings.description: If set, then all subfolders will be indexed in the same name as the folder.

plugin.settings.title: Title to use for Index notes
plugin.settings.description: This can include a placeholder `{{folder}}` or `{{full_folder_path}}` which will be replaced by the folder's name or full path.

plugin.settings.title: 'open URL from a note' command setting
Ignore URLs in completed items?
plugin.settings.description: Whether to ignore URLs found in completed (or cancelled) tasks or checklists.

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description: Set how much output will be displayed for this plugin in the NotePlan > Help > Plugin Console. DEBUG is the most verbose; NONE is the least (silent).
